description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a Search Node

targets.query: SELECT 8 * non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"),1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" = 'JumpHost' AND "interface" = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
